summary: THE VEHICLE LUNGES AFTER YOU STOP AS IF IT IS DOWN SHIFTING.  SOMETIMES IT BANGS AND JUMPS SUDDENLY WHEN TAKING OFF FROM A STOP. THE CAMERA TURNS TO SNOW OR MOVING OBJECTS APPEAR FRAME BY FRAME AND NOT IN REAL TIME.  THE CONTROLS FAIL TO ALLOW GATE OPERATION.
